version_description:
-Complete redesign of Main Screen and other UI elements
-Added NEW MODE: SURVIVAL MULTIPLAYER – survive online with friends or alone!
-Now players start playing in Third-Person camera view mode by default in Creative Multiplayer Mode
-Now you can view more users around you

New Features for Survival Multiplayer Mode:
- Send private chat messages to offline friends via push notifications!
- Added 3rd-person camera button directly to HUD!
- Get leather armor and swords in the game’s shop using coins
- Use charged creeper to have zombie and skeleton drop their mob heads
- Wear mob head similar to helmet
- Fill cauldron with any potion bottles or water
- Dye and/or paint leather armor using cauldron and one of the 16 available Dyes
- Tap a cauldron with potion using normal arrow and it will make that arrow a tipped one with that potion effect!

LONG-AWAITED update! Stay in touch for more exciting features:

- Added new game mode – PRIVATE MAPS. Create your own maps and play with friends or everybody worldwide!
- Now you can create your own personal private multiplayer maps in SURVIVAL or CREATIVE modes using PRIVATE MAPS MODE!
- Choose who can join your personal maps and who can modify them: ONLY YOU, YOUR FRIENDS or just EVERYONE!
- You can select one from 20 predefined templates during PRIVATE MAP creation in both SURVIVAL and CREATIVE MODES.
- Removed the need to buy teleport scrolls in the GLOBAL SURVIVAL MULTIPLAYER MODE.

Nice update with improvements and fixes:

-Improved private chest displaying in spawn zones
-Fixed display of diamond armor in the inventory
-Fixed wall “x-ray” bug
-Fixed bug with CHEST opening in spawn zone if player has a block in the hand
-Multiplayer and 3D rendering speed optimizations

Update the game today and start playing NOW!

Great update with cool new features. Get it today and enjoy!

- Added Achievements in survival multiplayer mode! Complete every achievement and earn even more coins to spend in the SHOP. Develop your skills as you progress and become the ultimate survivor in the global open world!
- New ability to invite friends to play with you in the current game
- New dropper block in survival singleplayer mode
- Holiday theme in spawn zones and game graphics
- Added localization of the game to 4 new languages: Japanese, Chinese, Korean and Sweden
- User Interface, 3D rendering and network connection improvements

New update with several important things:

- no more problems with excessive generation of mobs in Survival single-player mode
- fixed problems with offline and online network connections
- fixed bugs when elytra displayed incorrectly for other users during the flight
- network optimization and 3D rendering improvement

AWESOME UPDATE in Game SHOP, Private Maps and Graphics!

- Updated SHOP for Survival Mode with many new categories and items to spend coins on. Now you can buy anything you want: food, weapon, armor, various tools and even potions!
- New item in the SHOP: FREE COINS. Earn some coins for FREE!
- Added TRADER NPC in the spawn zone who sells all items cheaper
- New great skin pack – FAMILY. Choose your role and create your family in Multiplayer modes!
- New item – HOME POINT. Use HOME POINT item to set your respawn position after death or manual respawn
- Private Maps list now shows all maps that you have liked and disliked
- All read-only Private Maps are now labeled with read-only icon
- Now we display Private Maps with 3 sorted columns: By Likes, By Online and By Newest
- All Friends’ Maps are now displayed in the separate TAB
- Added Electricity in the Single player Survival mode
- New better 3D models for some of the mobs in the Survival Mode
- Many graphical improvements: teleport portal rendering, block textures improvements, etc.

Great update with cool new features. Get it today and enjoy!

- Added Achievements in survival multiplayer mode! Complete every achievement and earn even more coins to spend in the SHOP. Develop your skills as you progress and become the ultimate survivor in the global open world!
- New ability to invite friends to play with you in the current game
- New dropper block in survival singleplayer mode
- Holiday theme in spawn zones and game graphics
- Added localization of the game to 4 new languages: Japanese, Chinese, Korean and Sweden
- User Interface, 3D rendering and network connection improvements

New update with several important things:

- no more problems with excessive generation of mobs in Survival single-player mode
- fixed problems with offline and online network connections
- fixed bugs when elytra displayed incorrectly for other users during the flight
- network optimization and 3D rendering improvement

Nice update with improvements and fixes:

-Improved private chest displaying in spawn zones
-Fixed display of diamond armor in the inventory
-Fixed wall “x-ray” bug
-Fixed bug with CHEST opening in spawn zone if player has a block in the hand
-Multiplayer and 3D rendering speed optimizations

Update the game today and start playing NOW!

Another great update with top new features, bells and whistles. Download it now and have fun like never with your pals online!

- We have added Potion of Inventory Protection! Use it – and you never loose items from your inventory after death! Duration of this special potion is not limited until you die
- We have added Woodland Mansions! Find them outside spawn zone to get chests with unique items. However, they are full of new dangerous monsters like evokers, vindicators and vexes!
- Now you can complete Achievements and earn coins in any order
- New mobs: Mule and Donkey. Other users can't attack them in the spawn zone if you ride such mobs
- Now you can ride a Pig mob
- More options for your own private maps: PVP, Friendly Fire, Mobs, Difficulty
- Added Evoker, Vindicator and Vex in the Woodland Mansion
- Now you can repair Elytra with Phantom Membrane
- New flight animation for players in Creative mode
- Now you can put various plants into a Flower Pot
- Better 3D model of the Ostrich and Baby Ostrich mobs
- Added new female skins for Zombies
- Updated Inventory in Creative mode: added search and category tab
- Improved visuals for burning arrows
- Added many new sounds to the game
- Implemented various UI improvements and fixes
- 3D rendering speed improvement

Great Christmas and New Year update. Many new features and improvements. Download the game and play with your friends now!

* Updated Spawn Zones with Xmas and New Year themes
* Updated default texture pack to create Christmas and New Year atmosphere in the game
* New festive graphical elements in the user interface
* Added fun and cool Christmas and New Year decorations for many mobs
* New “Christmas” section to the shop with Christmas items promotions and discounts
* Implemented boat. You can either craft a boat or buy it in the shop. Use the boat for better and faster transportation on the water
* Now we display number of players in all online modes
* We have significantly improved AI for aggressive mobs in survival modes
* Updated 3D model of the ostrich mob
* Added support for mobile devices with elements like notches and hole punches
* We have improved usability of “Close” button for windows like chest, craft, inventory, and others
* Added numerous 3D rendering and FPS optimizations
